description: Your skin has turned the color of antique dolls.  Your skin is now a pearlescent white.  This has no gameplay effects.
Your skin has smoothed and all blemishes fade quickly away.  Somewhat reduces wet effects and is tougher but heals a little slower.
Your skin has become latex-like.  It provides some additional protection and attractiveness but heals at a much slower rate.
The Dollkin gains the ability to speak whispers into the remaining thoughts of a feral and convince the feral in question that you are not a foe.
By crossing a few wires in a feral human's mind the Dollkin is able to change the feral into a less dangerous version.
Once per season, you may engage in a strenuous ritual to reconstruct the mind of someone whose mind was destroyed in the Cataclysm.
The Dollkin summons a repair kit that has the ability to repair almost anything.
//: Ideally I can add a mend activity that will remove the fried electronics flag.

description: The Dollkin's enemies within the target area become covered in a sickly sweet goop that summons angry vermin to attack and distract them.
//: Cross between tindalos fog and boomer bile.

description: Once per season you may curse an enemy to die in the most cliched way possible.
//: Build an EOC finds where you are inside, outside, in city, in wilderness, above ground or below ground and based on where you are something horrificly damaging occurs to your enemy.  In a city maybe a piano falls on them, in the wilderness maybe a meteor crashes onto their head.

description: Once per week you mentally search for a valuable location.
Upon gaining this ability the Dollkin's eyes begin reflecting their mood with colors of the deep waters, pitch black when angry or sad and green-blue when pleased.  Glare no longer impacts them.
//: A once a month ability that allows the Homullus to be reborn instantly upon death in a nearby HUMAN monster.  If one is not nearby the power will fail.

description: The Homullus is able to make traders make an error and give them extra credit towards goods.
You can make some simple repairs to items that have been broken by water or EMP.
By playing some jamming tunes on the musical instrument of your choice, you create an area of effect increasing the combat capabilities of your nearby allies.
//: Spell increases dodge and other melee stats for NPCs in range of effect centered on PC, will require a musical instrument component.

description: The Dollkin has resistance to attacks on it's ability to act on it's choices.
Your powers enhance your mundane senses and allow you to detect human beings.
This and other abilities native to Dollkin suggest that if vampires did create cities to concentrate their prey, something evolved afterwards to complicate the hunting grounds.
By speaking soothing words and touching a living Renfield the Dollkin may attempt to break the vampires mental hold and convert that person into a panicked person.
